scripts.install: npm run typechain && cp ./.env*.local app && cd app && npm install
scripts.deploy_escrow: hardhat ignition deploy --network mainnet ignition/modules/Escrow.ts && cp -r ignition/deployments ./app/src/lib/deployments
scripts.deploy_nft: hardhat ignition deploy --network mainnet ignition/modules/TestNft.ts && cp -r ignition/deployments ./app/src/lib/deployments
scripts.app: cp ./.env*.local app && cd app && npm run dev & npm run server
